page.title: 19AN ITEM FROM THE NEWSPAPER
page.content: { LIDSTONE'S REUNION} (Kbridge G. 7/85) More than 150 descendants from different branches of the Lidstone family which has been established in the South Hams for over 400 years will meet together in September. They will come from as far away as New Zealand,Canada,Australia and America to find their roots in a reunion organised by members of the Lidstone family of this area. This is a culmination of searching started by{Hugh Lidstone}twelve years ago.A magazine{'The Lidstorian'}is produced monthly for the family Soc. The reunion will begin on Sept. 15th with a reception at the King's Arms Hotel in Kingsbridge and spend the next two days on visits and trips. High on the list will be the small hamlet of{LEDSTONE}which used to be called{Lidstone!
